fields.summary: fix exim for MM tables and reinstante the test

comments.body:
This was surprisingly easy to fix after some digging. 
I think the test may need to be expanded for import overwrite... I may do it here or in separate jira, cause I was also going to fix load from export, which may justify a separate jira.
[~steveyeom2017] [~ekoifman] can you take a look? The code changes are pretty small
